description.translate: And don't remind me of home or	I might notice where I am.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Nuage des cités endormies\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Et ne me rappellez pas la maison\"}","{\"text\":\"§7ou je pourrais réaliser où je suis.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7And don't remind me of home or\"}","{\"text\":\"§7I might notice where I am.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7DAR§a3\"}"]}}
